price: 57. Kuwa ku dhiba Alle (shirki, xume fal iyo hadal xun) Rasuulkiisana (qowl ama ficil) - Alle wuu nacladay adduun iyo Aakhiraba, wuxuuna u diyaariyey Cadaab dulleysa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا مُّهِينٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yu'dhūna al-laha warasūlahu laʿanahumu al-lahu fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wa-aʿadda lahum ʿadhāban muhīnan
